name: NSMappingModel
desc: A model instance that specifies how to map a model from a source to a destination managed object model.

items.name: init?(from: [Bundle]?, forSourceModel: NSManagedObjectModel?, destinationModel: NSManagedObjectModel?)
items.desc: Returns the mapping model that will translate data from the source to the destination model.

items.name: class func inferredMappingModel(forSourceModel: NSManagedObjectModel, destinationModel: NSManagedObjectModel) -> NSMappingModel
items.desc: Returns a newly created mapping model that will migrate data from the source to the destination model.

items.name: init?(contentsOf: URL?)
items.desc: Returns a mapping model initialized from a given URL.

items.name: var entityMappings: [NSEntityMapping]!
items.desc: The entity mappings for the mapping model.

items.name: var entityMappingsByName: [String : NSEntityMapping]
items.desc: The entity mappings for the mapping model, keyed by name.
